Reviews.Title: Must Buy
Reviews.Author: Travis
Reviews.Content: This is a must buy for those folks that are wanting security on a tight budget.  This product didn't just meet my expectations but far exceeded.  Cameras do need a little help at night when it comes to the IR side but what do you really expect at this price point.  Easy to set up and install.  The operations is a bit more complex when the instructions that come with it suck so bad but a few days you'll have it all figured out.I wouldn't just recommend this system, I would instruct you to make this your purchase.  WELL WORTH THE MONEY.

ProductInfo.Features:
10.2" Compact Tablet Monitor DVR allows up to 8 Channels playback.
Four 520TVL cameras with 24 IR LEDs technology to help you see up to 50ft at night.
High resolution cameras allow you to have greater coverage and viewing angle with 3.6mm fixed lens.
Surveillance grade pre-installed 500GB HDD stores more with less space with H.264 dual stream video compression technology.
View and playback from your mobile device with our free LaView apps for Smartphones
